issue.title: [Java] Support concating vectors values in batch
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7073](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7073). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We need a way to copy vector values in batch. Currently, we have copyFrom and copyFromSafe APIs. However, they are not enough, as copying values individually is not performant.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7073?focusedCommentId=17029586) by Micah Kornfield (emkornfield@gmail.com):*
Issue resolved by pull request 5916
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5916>
